item.description: ðŸ‘‹ Hello, I’m Aditya! I spend a lot of time thinking about technology, business, strategy and the intersection between them. More specifically I’m interested in how strategic choices influence technology and to some extent how technological choices once made become constraints for strategy. I’m fortunate enough to have people around me who are also interested in some of these things and we have fun conversing about these things. A bunch of the ideas that I write about would either have originated from those conversations or would have been in some shape or form influenced by them.
